I'm a starting developer in Debian and Ubuntu.  I've started getting involved in the Debian project nearly 1 year ago and I've managed to grab the maintenance of the official Erlang packages.  I've since made a few more package from scratch, and patched a few other one.  I'm happy with triaging and fixing bug right now but I won't hide that my goal is to eventually become a MOTU, or, at least, a very active maintainer.

=== Packages I maintain ===

* Erlang (erlang-base, erlang-base-hipe, erlang-nox, erlang-x11, erlang-manpages, erlang-doc-html)

I plan to become involved with Dapper backporting team once Dapper is released, and I will probably add some more packages to that list, through REVU or Debian.

=== Bugs I'm hunting ===

* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/arts/+bug/34983|34983]]</nowiki> - Arts freezes when using esound has a backend.
